title: What does cold water mean in this hadith? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: how are you sh I'm fine alhamdulillah there is aith in AB where it says that oh I indeed I ask you for your love and the love of those who you love and for the action that will cause me to attain your love oh make your love more beloved to me than myself my family and cold water can you explain what it means by cold water cold water is something that people enjoy in hot weather even in normal weather and the opposite of cold water is hot water so when you're thirsty and someone presents you with with something that's hot you don't feel that this is the best thing to uh consume but you would love to drink a cold drink and cold water is the best to quench your thirst so this is what is meant by the Hadith and Allah Knows Best
